messages.title: GIVE ME AND MY CANDIDATE YOUR VOTE ON THURSDAY 8TH JUNE AND I WILL:
messages.content: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country. Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future. Always stand up for you and your family.

messages.title: Back me on Thursday 8th June to lead Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Back the Prime Minister’s plan to make a success of Brexit so our local economy can continue to prosper.
Work to drive up standards in local schools.
Tackle crime and anti-social behaviour and create and protect local jobs.

issues.brexitEurope: Back the Prime Minister’s plan to make a success of Brexit so our local economy can continue to prosper.
issues.economy: Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future.
issues.education: Work to drive up standards in local schools.
issues.governance: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country.
issues.socialWelfare: Tackle crime and anti-social behaviour and create and protect local jobs.

contactInformation.address: 32 Chilwell Road, Beeston, Nottingham, Nottinghamshire, NG9 1EJ

endorsements.endorsement: Provide strong and stable leadership for our country. Get the best Brexit deal possible to deliver economic security for our future. Always stand up for you and your family.

quotes.text: Don’t risk our future at this crucial moment in history with a vote for anyone else.

images.caption: Amanda Solloway standing with Theresa May. More Jobs Better Schools Cleaner Streets.
